long_description: Slide your feet into the Birkenstock Milano sandals and experience centuries of Birkenstock fine-tuning their comfort. And the footbeds mold to your feet over time, delivering a personalized fit. Thick yet supple leather straps feature metal buckles for an adjustable fit. Original Birkenstock footbeds feature soft suede leather topsoles for softness against skin, and cork/latex blend midsoles offer pronounced arch support and deep heel cups. Birkenstock Milano sandals feature flexible and lightweight shock-absorbing EVA outsoles.
short_description: Slide your feet into the Birkenstock Milano sandals and experience centuries of Birkenstock fine-tuning their comfort. And the footbeds mold to your feet over time, delivering a personalized fit.
